channel.title: CVE Feed for Sola Plugins -- Sola Testimonials
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sola Plugins -- Sola Testimonials

item.title: CVE-2024-38345|2024-07-08T18:20:47.769Z -- sola%20plugins -- sola%20testimonials
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability exists in Sola Testimonials versions prior to 3.0.0. If this vulnerability is exploited, an attacker allows a user who logs in to the WordPress site where the affected plugin is enabled to access a malicious page. As a result, the user may perform unintended operations on the WordPress site.
